conversation.message: Dear Student_E, we are delighted to receive your formal application. Your engagement during our previous conversations demonstrated a genuine understanding of and commitment to the rigorous academic environment we foster. We believe you will be an excellent addition to our community. We formally accept your application for admission to School_B.
